name: 2015 International Academic Conference on Social Sceiences and Management
content: 2015 International Academic Conference on Social Sceiences and Management (IACSSM 2015) aims to provide a forum for researchers, practitioners, and professionals from the industry, academia and government to discourse on research and development, professional practice in social sceinces and management. IACSSM 2015 will be held in Okinawa, Japan during July 29-31, 2015\. It is one of the leading international conferences for presenting novel and fundamental advances in the fields of social sciences and management. It also serves to foster communication among researchers and practitioners working in a wide variety of professional areas with a common interest in all relevant issues of social sciences and management.
